response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we are confident it would be an excellent investment for you. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, tailored specifically for your needs. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information.
